commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: This must be the scene of the crime. I can smell the case already!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Huh? *Sniff* *Sniff* ...I don't smell anything.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: No one can deceive the senses of the great detective Yohane, for I am the most stupendous, miraculous, incredible detective in the world!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Go on! Tell us the details of what happened at the time of the crime!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Um, details? I can really only explain what happened...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: About an hour ago, I was checking on the props we're going to use for our musical.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: But no matter how many times I checked, I couldn't find the tablecloth. I searched the room all over.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Then I saw there was a message from the thief...on the desk!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: A message from the thief?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It was this card. Take a look.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Let's see... "I've taken your tablecloth. —Mysterious Thief K"

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Mysterious Thief K? Who's that?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh heh. I know not, but so be it! They are all but doomed now that Yohane is on the scene. They shall rue this day!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: A prop tablecloth suddenly vanishing from the room...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I believe this was a trick performed behind closed doors!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: But the doors here aren't closed.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I-I know that. I've just always wanted to say that!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, so that's why you said it.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Anyway, have no fear! Hanayo and I will get that tablecloth back!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wait, me?! I-I can't...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You can, and you must! You're my assistant, so it's only elementary that we should solve the mystery together!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: As we navigate the labyrinth of mysteries that exist in this realm...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Your line is next, Hanayo. And it isn't, "Huh?"

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: O-Oh... From the musical? Um, do I really have to say it?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Of course you do! Come on!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: As we navigate the labyrinth of mysteries that exist in this realm...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: ...w-we shall uncover the truth.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Even the most nefarious, diabolical plots...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: ...sh-shall crumble to dust in our hands.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko ＆ Hanayo
commands.line: Let us open the door to truth...together!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hmm, that last line still needs work.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Ugh!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Aw, I-I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I guess now's not the time for notes. Good luck, great detective and assistant! Hope you solve the case!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Since the incident happened here at Nijigasaki High School, maybe Ayumu knows something about the mysterious thief.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: She should be in the gym right now, having a meeting with the set crew. Why don't you go and talk to her?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You can count on us! Let's go, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wait up!
